title: Educational and Marketing posts
body:
Created two comprehensive posts for the Mint Club specifically for the XRP and Hive communities:

https://lifebe.com.au/digital/mint-club-free-token-airdrop-free-tokens-for-everyone/

https://lifebe.com.au/digital/what-to-do-with-your-mint-club-airdrop/

These were shared to the Steemit blockchain, the Hive blockchain and the XRP community (via MG.Social and Coil) as well as Twitter, Pinterest and the Mint Club Telegram group.

The analytics from my blog are available here:
https://app.usefathom.com/share/bsjvznil/lifebe.com.au#/?filters=%5B%5D&from=2021-06-01%2000%3A00%3A00&range=custom&site=33525&to=2021-07-31%2023%3A59%3A59

MetaMask BSC Wallet is 0x433f12b3204cE57E9a95dfc5C14092889f1aEF10
author: 0x433f12b3204cE57E9a95dfc5C14092889f1aEF10
